Bane.Name: Bane
Bane.Description: Deal 7 (10) damage. If the enemy has Poison, deal 7 (10) damage again.

Cloak and Dagger.Name: Cloak and Dagger
Cloak and Dagger.Description: Gain 6 Block. Add 1 Shiv into your hand.
Cloak and Dagger.Description (Upgraded): Gain 6 Block. Add 2 Shivs into your hand.

Dagger Spray.Name: Dagger Spray
Dagger Spray.Description: Deal 4 (6) damage to ALL enemies twice.

Dagger Throw.Name: Dagger Throw
Dagger Throw.Description: Deal 9 (12) damage. Draw 1 card. Discard 1 card.

Dodge and Roll.Name: Dodge and Roll
Dodge and Roll.Description: Gain 4 (6) Block. Next turn, gain 4 (6) Block.

Piercing Wail.Name: Piercing Wail
Piercing Wail.Description: ALL enemies lose 6 (8) Strength this turn. Exhaust.

Sneaky Strike.Name: Sneaky Strike
Sneaky Strike.Description: Deal 12 (16) damage. If you have discarded a card this turn, gain [G] [G].

All-Out Attack.Name: All-Out Attack
All-Out Attack.Description: Deal 10 (14) damage to ALL enemies. Discard 1 card at random.

Blur.Name: Blur
Blur.Description: Gain 5 (8) Block. Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

Bouncing Flask.Name: Bouncing Flask
Bouncing Flask.Description: Apply 3 Poison to a random enemy 3 (4) times.

Calculated Gamble.Name: Calculated Gamble
Calculated Gamble.Description: Discard your hand, then draw that many cards. Exhaust.
Calculated Gamble.Description (Upgraded): Discard your hand, then draw that many cards.

Caltrops.Name: Caltrops
Caltrops.Description: Whenever you are attacked, deal 3 (5) damage back.

Choke.Name: Choke
Choke.Description: Deal 12 damage. Whenever you play a card this turn, the enemy loses 3 (5) HP.

Crippling Cloud.Name: Crippling Cloud
Crippling Cloud.Description: Apply 4 (7) Poison and 2 Weak to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

Distraction.Name: Distraction
Distraction.Description: Add a random Skill into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

Endless Agony.Name: Endless Agony
Endless Agony.Description: Deal 4 (6) damage. Whenever you draw this card, add a copy of it into your hand. Exhaust.

Escape Plan.Name: Escape Plan
Escape Plan.Description: Draw 1 card. If you draw a Skill, gain 3 (5) Block.

Eviscerate.Name: Eviscerate
Eviscerate.Description: Costs 1 less [G] for each card discarded this turn. Deal 7 (9) damage 3 times.

Expertise.Name: Expertise
Expertise.Description: Draw cards until you have 6 (7) in your hand.

Finisher.Name: Finisher
Finisher.Description: Deal 6 (8) damage for each Attack played this turn.

Flechettes.Name: Flechettes
Flechettes.Description: Deal 4 (6) damage for each Skill in your hand.

Heel Hook.Name: Heel Hook
Heel Hook.Description: Deal 5 (8) damage. If the enemy has Weak, gain [G] and draw 1 card.

Infinite Blades.Name: Infinite Blades
Infinite Blades.Description: At the start of your turn, add a Shiv into your hand.
Infinite Blades.Description (Upgraded): Innate. At the start of your turn, add a Shiv into your hand.

Masterful Stab.Name: Masterful Stab
Masterful Stab.Description: Costs 1 additional [G] for each time you lose HP this combat. Deal 12 (16) damage.

Noxious Fumes.Name: Noxious Fumes
Noxious Fumes.Description: At the start of your turn, apply 2 (3) Poison to ALL enemies.

Predator.Name: Predator
Predator.Description: Deal 15 (20) damage. Next turn, draw 2 additional cards.

Reflex.Name: Reflex
Reflex.Description: Unplayable. If this card is discarded from your hand, draw 2 cards.
Reflex.Description (Upgraded): Unplayable. If this card is discarded from your hand, draw 3 cards.

Setup.Name: Setup
Setup.Description: Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. It costs 0 until played.

Tactician.Name: Tactician
Tactician.Description: Unplayable. If this card is discarded from your hand, gain [G].
Tactician.Description (Upgraded): Unplayable. If this card is discarded from your hand, gain [G] [G].

Well-Laid Plans.Name: Well-Laid Plans
Well-Laid Plans.Description: At the end of your turn, Retain up to 1 card.
Well-Laid Plans.Description (Upgraded): At the end of your turn, Retain up to 2 cards.

A Thousand Cuts.Name: A Thousand Cuts
A Thousand Cuts.Description: Whenever you play a card, deal 1 (2) damage to ALL enemies.

After Image.Name: After Image
After Image.Description: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 Block.
After Image.Description (Upgraded): Innate. Whenever you play a card, gain 1 Block.

Bullet Time.Name: Bullet Time
Bullet Time.Description: You cannot draw additional cards this turn. Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 0 this turn.

Burst.Name: Burst
Burst.Description: This turn, your next Skill is played twice.
Burst.Description (Upgraded): This turn, your next 2 Skills are played twice.

Corpse Explosion.Name: Corpse Explosion
Corpse Explosion.Description: Apply 6 (9) Poison. When the enemy dies, deal damage equal to its Max HP to ALL enemies.

Die Die Die.Name: Die Die Die
Die Die Die.Description: Deal 13 (17) damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

Doppelganger.Name: Doppelganger
Doppelganger.Description: Next turn, draw X cards and gain X [G]. Exhaust.
Doppelganger.Description (Upgraded): Next turn, draw X+1 cards and gain X+1 [G]. Exhaust.

Envenom.Name: Envenom
Envenom.Description: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Poison.

Glass Knife.Name: Glass Knife
Glass Knife.Description: Deal 8 (12) damage twice. Decrease the damage of this card by 2 this combat.

Grand Finale.Name: Grand Finale
Grand Finale.Description: Can only be played if there are no cards in your draw pile. Deal 50 (60) damage to ALL enemies.

Malaise.Name: Malaise
Malaise.Description: Enemy loses X Strength. Apply X Weak. Exhaust.
Malaise.Description (Upgraded): Enemy loses X+1 Strength. Apply X+1 Weak. Exhaust.

Nightmare.Name: Nightmare
Nightmare.Description: Choose a card. Next turn, add 3 copies of that card into your hand. Exhaust.

Phantasmal Killer.Name: Phantasmal Killer
Phantasmal Killer.Description: Next turn, your Attacks deal double damage.

Storm of Steel.Name: Storm of Steel
Storm of Steel.Description: Discard your hand. Add 1 Shiv into your hand for each card discarded.
Storm of Steel.Description (Upgraded): Discard your hand. Add 1 Shiv+ into your hand for each card discarded.

Tools of the Trade.Name: Tools of the Trade
Tools of the Trade.Description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and discard 1 card.

Unload.Name: Unload
Unload.Description: Deal 14 (18) damage. Discard all non-Attack cards in your hand.

Wraith Form.Name: Wraith Form
Wraith Form.Description: Gain 2 (3) Intangible. At the end of your turn, lose 1 Dexterity.
